wp:term.wp:term_description: Recipient was mentioned in an activity update.
A member has replied to an activity update that the recipient posted.
A member has replied to a comment on an activity update that the recipient posted.
Recipient has registered for an account.
Recipient has registered for an account and site.
A member has sent a friend request to the recipient.
Recipient has had a friend request accepted by a member.
Recipient was mentioned in a group activity update.
A member has sent a group invitation to the recipient.
Recipient's status within a group has changed.
A member has requested permission to join a group.
Recipient had requested to join a group, which was accepted.
Recipient had requested to join a group, which was rejected.
Recipient has received a private message.
Recipient has changed their email address.

item.title: Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus

item.content:encoded:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. item.title: 00-Intro
item.dc:creator: javo
item.content:encoded:
LISTOPIA V2

Listopia Community & Directory

Community, Magazine, Directory, WooCommerce, Events

Multipurpose Directory Theme

Based BuddyPress, BBPress which are the most popular community plugin in WordPress

Tour Community

Members, Friends

Members, Friends Connection ( like followers ), Private Message

Groups

Your users can create groups to let other users to join and talk

Forum

Forum is ready by BBPress. Your users can make topics and talk.

5 Types of Directory Theme

We provide great 5 styles directory theme. Different headers, map styles

  • List Item #1
  • List Item #2
  • List Item #3
Tour Community

Custom Module

You can create Members, Groups Module. We already created 3 modules. It's by drag & drop live builder.

List Builder

Members, Groups list can be modified by drag & drop live builder. Place list meta where you want

List Scroll Effects

8 different scroll effects are ready.
You can always change by your tastes. Your visitors won't be bored.

Page Builder

Business Directory Feature is ready. Add your local business shops & companies.

Map & List Directories

Based on google maps, you can add business shops & business. Front-end form is ready for your users to post listings.

Flexible Search Form

You can create search forms what you need by drag & drop live search form builder.

Customizable Map

Each Map Meta is ready to be for customization. You can change, remove and add by drag & drop live builder.

Don't Miss Directory Features

Javo Page Builder

Have a Magazine or News pages. It's great to have a magazine page to keep your users visiting.

  • List Item #1
  • List Item #2
  • List Item #3
See Magazine

Post Detail

Have a Magazine or News pages. It's great to have a magazine page to keep your users visiting.

Listing Detail

Your users can post articles. Admin can setup pending or publish the new posts. You can also add a notice.

Listing Archive

Magazine layouts are by all drag & drop live builder. You can add, remove or change post types, categories, tags by post block builder.

Listing Detail Page

Event Calendar is ready. Add events for your community.
Lava event connecter links listings

  • List Item #1
  • List Item #2
  • List Item #3
Toggle #1

Toggle #2

Toggle #1

See The Details

Customize Module Card

Event Calendar is ready. Add events for your community.
Lava event connecter links listings

Check Event List

Advanced Search Form

Event Calendar is ready. Add events for your community.
Lava event connecter links listings

Check Event List

Paid Listings

Event Calendar is ready. Add events for your community.
Lava event connecter links listings

Check Event List

Featured Listings Anywhere

Event Calendar is ready. Add events for your community.
Lava event connecter links listings

Check Event List

Month, List, Day Display

Month as a calendar, List, Day display is ready. Your user will be easily have a look at your event list

Event Detail

Event detail shows very effect information such as image, date, organizer, venue. It's also possible to send google calendar, ICAL export

Listing on an event

Event connection addon is ready.
You can also attach ( link ) events on listings by lava event addon.

See Theme Features
And also Listing Features

We made posts for our main features. It's only main features. We have more.

Go to See Features Details

Other Features

You can have stream social list. You don't need to post on multiple places. Post in a place and link with social stream page

See Social Streaming

Instagram Live Stream

You can have stream social list. You don't need to post on multiple places. Post one place and link with social stream page

Youtube Live Stream

You can have stream social list. You don't need to post on multiple places. Post one place and link with social stream page

Vimeo Live Stream

You can have stream social list. You don't need to post on multiple places. Post one place and link with social stream page

Vimeo Live Stream

You can have stream social list. You don't need to post on multiple places. Post one place and link with social stream page

Strong Points of Javo

What Makes Javo Different and You can use it.

See Social Streaming

Customization

You can have stream social list. You don't need to post on multiple places. Post one place and link with social stream page

Various Uses

You can have stream social list. You don't need to post on multiple places. Post one place and link with social stream page

Easy to Setup

You can have stream social list. You don't need to post on multiple places. Post one place and link with social stream page

Super Easy Setup

Super Easy Customize

Where does it come from? Contrary to popular belief

Here are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum

Our Team

Business Directory Feature is ready. Add your local business shops & companies.

Facebook Twitter Google-plus Instagram Whatsapp

ENVATO ELITE AUTHOR

This Item is designed and developed
by an envato elite author

Purchase Now

Build Today
The Best Directory Theme!

The new version has been improved huge.
You may need to change some parts and import our demo data.

See The Details

e-commerce by WC

It supports WC (WooCommerce). Build your own e-commerce shop page. WC is the most popular plugin in WordPress and It's ready to use.

Masonry, Grid, Default

Masonry, Grid, Default styles are ready to use. You can simply change in backend. Modify style, color, layout (gap, amounts )

Payment, Card, My Page

Paypal or more Payment, My Cart, My Page , Coupon, Static are ready.

item.title: 00-Intro - Envato
item.dc:creator: javo
item.content:encoded:
Community

Based BuddyPress, BBPress which are the most popular community plugin in WordPress

Community

Directory

Business Directory Feature is ready. Add your local business shops & companies.

Directory Features

Magazine

Have a Magazine or News pages. It's great to have a magazine page to keep your users visiting.

Magazine

Event Calendar.

Event Calendar is ready. Add events for your community.
Lava event connecter links listings

Event List

Social Connection

Stream social list. You don't need to post on multiple places. Post in a place and link with social stream page

Social Streaming

Shop

Build your own e-commerce shop page by WooCommerce. WC is the most popular plugin in WordPress and It's ready to use.

Visit Shop

item.title: Intro
item.dc:creator: javo
item.content:encoded:
LISTOPIA V2

Listopia Community & Directory

Community, Magazine, Directory, WooCommerce, Events

https://youtu.be/6f4BphaeChY Not only few colors

Customize Everything.

Thank you for Elementor Pagebuilder, you are not able to build and customize most of pages by live builder. It's not only changing few colors. You can modify basic pages (such as blog list, blog detail ) and also map pages, list pages, detail pages and even Search form, module cards... etc. BuddyPress modules as well. Our themes are versatile and usable. If you want, use the BuddyPress plugin as a community site or use the Woocommerce plugin as a site for vendors. You can use both Directory and Community functionality, and if you like, you can use Woocommerce, BuddyPress, and Directory all together. Main Feature Details

Live Page Builder Supported

Page, Posts

You can build pages by live builder and post. Support post layout builder!

Listing

You can now modify all listing detail layouts, map, list even Search form.

BuddyPress

BuddyPress member, group list and each modules, effect are possible to modify.

5 Style of Directory Theme

We provide great 5 styles directory theme. Different headers, map styles

Style 1 - Classic Style This is Listopia V1 version. We have improved listing detail pages, map pages, Search form even header buttons. You will love them. Style 2 - Advanced Search Style It’s more for complicated or detail search sites. If you need more fields to add on search form, you will love it.  The search form can be modified by drag and drop! Style 3 - Common Simple Style We added common simple style header.  Smart ajax search form is on header and your visitors can always search easily. Style 4 - Transparent Header Style Having transparent header is always clean and looks simple. We love this transparent header and added also smart ajax search! There are 2 search form in home page. You can remove 1 of them if you want. Style 5 - Magazine Style Have more favorite and return visitors to read your local news, stories and fun things! We provide magazine styles. We added map style, list style with magazine header. But you always change! Visit All Sites

FAQ

These are you should read to understand how it will be working.

Want to remove some?

Yes! Remove what you don't need. You can simply disable related pages, posts, page builder and plugins. or set private to hide them. Just have what you want.

Can I mix them?

You can always copy & paste tool to mix pages even single rows, cols and widgets! You want switch header or footer? Yes, just simply select a different header, footer even disable it!

Can I build new style?

Yes, you can build new header, footer, listing detail, post detail, post list, map list, search form, login form, signup form, even module cards... etc It's not changing few colors or select created moudles.

Few changes for a beginner?

Yes! It's not for expert web developers. As long as you know how to DRAG and DROP, you can do that. Few days later, you will be an expert. Then teach us. ;) There are many videos for Elementor and we will also keep adding.

Do I need to build all?

NO!! Many people misunderstood that you need to build all by page builder. It will be all added after you do 1 click import wizard. Then you need to setup few things for your new data, pages in your server. We provide Step by Step guildline and you can finish setup and modify others as you wish.

Can you help customization?

Yes, we can. we can only assist to setup your site like our demo. For others you need to do. But if you have much advanced, unique options, pages and features, we can do a paid service. Don't hire unknown developers. We are here to do your job and save your time.

Custom Module

You can create BuddyPress Modules, Post Modules, Listing Modules, Term Modules. This can be done with the drag & drop live builder, you can build using only page builders without hardcoding. And we provide a lot of modules. If you want, you can modify the module we provide or create your own new module.

List Builder

Listing detail layout & design can be modified by drag & drop live builder. You can add or modify the listing meta you want. You can change the position of each section or column. You can set a listing detail template for each listing, or you can set a listing detail template for all listing.

List Scroll Effects

Our theme supports Sticky function. You can use it by adding a class to the section you want. So you can create a comfortable UI for your site visitors to scroll to where you want them.

The Best Live Page Builder

The Page Builders help you build a website easiler these days. Elementor Page builders are great for novice users and even expert to customize their own sites with drag-and-drop ease.

See Details

Map & List Directories

Based on google maps, you can add business shops & business. Front-end form is ready for your users to post listings.

Flexible Search Form

You can create search forms what you need by drag & drop live search form builder.

Customizable Map

Each Map Meta is ready to be for customization. You can change, remove and add by drag & drop live builder.

Map & List Directories

Based on google maps, you can add business shops & business. Front-end form is ready for your users to post listings.

Flexible Search Form

You can create search forms what you need by drag & drop live search form builder.

Customizable Map

Each Map Meta is ready to be for customization. You can change, remove and add by drag & drop live builder.

Javo Page Builder

Javo page builder allows you to manage all the templates used in the theme such as header, footer, post, listing, module, etc.. And you can create a new template and modify the built-in template. General Builders It’s possible to create and modify theme layout element such as  header, footer, login, sign-up and canvas menu. Post, Page Builders It provides posts, pages by elementor page builder. And additionally, we added post page layout builder. It’s not only changing contents. You can make different post layouts.   Listing Page Builders This is going to be most of listing site owners.  You are not changing few colors like other directory themes. It’s all you can change.  You can modify map pages, list pages, detail pages and even Search form! Buddpress module support If you want to have a community site, you can have members, groups and private messages. ( if you don’t want, you can disable specific options ) Member, Group list layout can be modified. It’s the first one in BuddyPress by Elementor! See Details

Post Detail

You can modify or create a post detail template using the javo page builder functionality. You can set a template for each post, or you can set a template for the entire post with global settings.

Listing Detail

You can modify or create a listing detail template using the javo page builder functionality. You can set a template for each listing , or you can set a template for the entire listing with global settings.

Listing Archive

You can customize, add, or change the layout of the archive listing page yourself. You can modify the Archive template to use a different layout than the Map page. This is easily done with the Page builder and you can easily add the widget you want.

Listing Detail Page Builder

We provide listing detail templates by default. You do not have to import a template separately. You can modify this template if you want. (widget location, column location, section location, meta modification, etc...) Our theme can be modified by drag & drop using the page builder without hardcoding. You can set a template for each listing, or you can set a template for the entire listing. Header Options There are 6 buttons for header. ( Videos, Image, Gallery, Map, Streeview, 3D View, Video ) 1. You can set which one shows first. 2. You can change ordering. 3. You can remove or add them. 4. You can define width. Favorite, Ave ratings, Share, Submit buttons are also possible to manage the same way. Great! It’s unique in This market. Layout Manager It’s simply drag & drop options to reorder and change the layout. Of course, you can change color and typography. You can add some shortcode if it’s compatible. Learn More Visit The Page

Explore page Builder

Create and customize your map page as you like. You can add a map to the location you want, or you can subtract the map if you do not want to. You can add only the filter you want, or you can easily delete it. And the map / list toggle button allows you to easily change the map and list on your mobile so that you can see the options. Map Options Map page main feature. 1. Change map color. 2. Change Map Markers. 3. Enable / Disable hover effect. 4. Modify Map Controllers. 5. Change width, height. Filter Options Map page main feature. 1. Change map color. 2. Change Map Markers. 3. Enable / Disable hover effect. 4. Modify Map Controllers. 5. Change width, height. Layout Manager It’s simply drag & drop options to reorder and change the layout. Of course, you can change color and typography. You can add some shortcode if it’s compatible. Learn More Visit The Page

Login & Signup Builder

Create and customize your map page as you like. You can add a map to the location you want, or you can subtract the map if you do not want to. You can add only the filter you want, or you can easily delete it. And the map / list toggle button allows you to easily change the map and list on your mobile so that you can see the options. See Details

Preview Builder

Create and customize your map page as you like. You can add a map to the location you want, or you can subtract the map if you do not want to. You can add only the filter you want, or you can easily delete it. And the map / list toggle button allows you to easily change the map and list on your mobile so that you can see the options. See Details

Customize Module Card

Create your own modules without hard coding. This is a powerful feature not found in any theme. We support the meta widget to make it easy to use the meta needed for the module. You can easily create your own modules by drag & drop, or you can modify the default module template provided by the theme. See Details

Search Form Builder

Customization can be done easily by adding desired filters. You can add required filters and delete unused filters. This feature is available on all pages. This feature is built into the theme.

See Details

Paid Listings

Business owners can free or paid packages to submit their listings and become a member. And earn money by monetizing listing submission by selling different listing submission packages. See Details

Featured Listings Anywhere

featured listings can be shown preferentially in all blocks. Or you can show featured listings only. If you have a page that you want to show featured listings, you can use the block widget to add a block where you want it and show featured listings. See Details

Month, List, Day Display

Month as a calendar, List, Day display is ready. Your user will be easily have a look at your event list

Event Detail

Event detail shows very effect information such as image, date, organizer, venue. It's also possible to send google calendar, ICAL export

Listing on an event

Event connection addon is ready. You can also attach ( link ) events on listings by lava event addon.

See Theme Features And also Listing Features

We made posts for our main features. It's only main features. We have more. See Details

Other Features

You can have stream social list. You don't need to post on multiple places. Post in a place and link with social stream page See Details

Instagram Live Stream

You can have stream social list. You don't need to post on multiple places. Post one place and link with social stream page

Youtube Live Stream

You can have stream social list. You don't need to post on multiple places. Post one place and link with social stream page

Strong Points of Javo

What Makes Javo Different and You can use it.

See Details

Customization

Our themes are designed to make it easy for users who are not programmers to customize. You can drag and drop almost everything you want using the widget we have created without hardcoding. (Map page, listing detail page, archive page, post page, search form, etc ..) Our customization team also offers premium services. With the premium service, create the widget you want and request a custom that requires hard coding.

Various Uses

Our theme can use the BuddyPress, Woocommerce, Directory feature. So you can use themes to your purpose.

Easy to Setup

You can easily install demo because it supports one-click import. And if you only have a few themes, you can have sites like demo.

Super Easy Import Demo Data

You can automatically install essential plugins and core plugins with one click. You can also import the demo directly from the install wizard step. You can save time because almost everything is automatic. See Details

Super Easy Customize

Our theme can be modified by the page builder to the point where hard coding is necessary. This is a powerful feature not found in other themes. search form, post meta, module, header, footer, etc.. You can modify the design with drag & drop without hard coding. See Details

Smart Ajax Search

You do not need to use multiple search forms to search for posts, listings, and pages on your site. You can use real-time search (Ajax) to get search results for every page, post, listing, category, title, etc.. on your site. See Details

Advanced Filters

In addition to the default search form, you can use the more taxonomies feature in the theme to add taxonomies and use them as searh filters.

Adding and changing the search form filter as you like is a powerful feature not found in any other theme, and you can also modify the filter's design. All of these features can be modified with the page builder without hardcoding. See Details

Events Management

Configure the settings to match your needs and you’ll be making events in less than 5 minutes. You can also manage events in the user dashboard. Our theme provides a calendar page so users can easily view all events. See Details

Woocommerce Support

Build your own e-commerce shop page by WooCommerce. WC is the most popular plugin in WordPress and It's ready to use.

See Details

Community Ready

We thought the Directory theme lacked community capabilities. So we created themes to use both Directory and Community features.

You can use powerful directory features and community features. See Details

User Dashboard

Community functions and directory functions can be used together in the user dashboard.

You can manage your own listings, posts, events, friends, etc .. It also includes the ability to check visitor statistics. User dashboard allows you to manage your listings, posts, friends, etc .. without visiting the admin page. e-commerce by WC

It supports WC (WooCommerce). Build your own e-commerce shop page. WC is the most popular plugin in WordPress and It's ready to use.

Masonry, Grid, Default

Masonry, Grid, Default styles are ready to use. You can simply change in backend. Modify style, color, layout (gap, amounts )

Payment, Card, My Page

Paypal or more Payment, My Cart, My Page , Coupon, Static are ready.

item.title: Intro
item.dc:creator: javo
item.content:encoded:
LYNK V2

Multipurpose Community Theme

Community, Magazine, Directory, WooCommerce, Events, Social

Community Main Feature

Based BuddyPress, BBPress which are the most popular community plugin in WordPress

Tour Community

Members, Friends

Members, Friends Connection ( like followers ), Private Message

Groups

Your users can create groups to let other users to join and talk

Forum

Forum is ready by BBPress. Your users can make topics and talk.

Custom Module

You can create Members, Groups Module. We already created 3 modules. It's by drag & drop live builder.

List Builder

Members, Groups list can be modified by drag & drop live builder. Place list meta where you want

List Scroll Effects

8 different scroll effects are ready.
You can always change by your tastes. Your visitors won't be bored.

Directory Main Feature

Business Directory Feature is ready. Add your local business shops & companies.

Don't Miss Directory Features

Map & List Directories

Based on google maps, you can add business shops & business. Front-end form is ready for your users to post listings.

Flexible Search Form

You can create search forms what you need by drag & drop live search form builder.

Customizable Map

Each Map Meta is ready to be for customization. You can change, remove and add by drag & drop live builder.

Customizable Detail Pages

Each Detail Meta is ready. You reorder, remove or add .. even change all colors and typography.

Near Me (Geo location)

Your users don't need to add address. Just click search current location button to get listings near me!

Useful Add-ons

Do you still need more features? Then purchase addons. It's on sale now. Review, More taxonomies, Favorites, 3D view, FAQ, Working hours..etc

Magazine Main Feature

Have a Magazine or News pages. It's great to have a magazine page to keep your users visiting.

See Magazine

Magazine Layout

Have a Magazine or News pages. It's great to have a magazine page to keep your users visiting.

Post Form Ready

Your users can post articles. Admin can setup pending or publish the new posts. You can also add a notice.

Posts + Listings

Magazine layouts are by all drag & drop live builder. You can add, remove or change post types, categories, tags by post block builder.

Event Calendar.

Event Calendar is ready. Add events for your community.
Lava event connecter links listings

Check Event List

Month, List, Day Display

Month as a calendar, List, Day display is ready. Your user will be easily have a look at your event list

Event Detail

Event detail shows very effect information such as image, date, organizer, venue. It's also possible to send google calendar, ICAL export

Listing on an event

Event connection addon is ready.
You can also attach ( link ) events on listings by lava event addon.

See Theme Features
And also Listing Features

We made posts for our main features. It's only main features. We have more.

Go to See Features Details

Social Connection

You can have stream social list. You don't need to post on multiple places. Post in a place and link with social stream page

See Social Streaming

Instagram Live Stream

You can have stream social list. You don't need to post on multiple places. Post one place and link with social stream page

Youtube Live Stream

You can have stream social list. You don't need to post on multiple places. Post one place and link with social stream page

Vimeo Live Stream

You can have stream social list. You don't need to post on multiple places. Post one place and link with social stream page

Shop

Build your own e-commerce shop page by WooCommerce. WC is the most popular plugin in WordPress and It's ready to use.

Visit Shop

e-commerce by WC

It supports WC (WooCommerce). Build your own e-commerce shop page. WC is the most popular plugin in WordPress and It's ready to use.

Masonry, Grid, Default

Masonry, Grid, Default styles are ready to use. You can simply change in backend. Modify style, color, layout (gap, amounts )

Payment, Card, My Page

Paypal or more Payment, My Cart, My Page , Coupon, Static are ready.

Themes Users Active Installs

item.title: Intro - Envato
item.dc:creator: javo
item.content:encoded:
Community

Based BuddyPress, BBPress which are the most popular community plugin in WordPress

Community

Directory

Business Directory Feature is ready. Add your local business shops & companies.

Directory Features

Magazine

Have a Magazine or News pages. It's great to have a magazine page to keep your users visiting.

Magazine

Event Calendar.

Event Calendar is ready. Add events for your community.
Lava event connecter links listings

Event List

Social Connection

Stream social list. You don't need to post on multiple places. Post in a place and link with social stream page

Social Streaming

Shop

Build your own e-commerce shop page by WooCommerce. WC is the most popular plugin in WordPress and It's ready to use.

Visit Shop
